channel.title: Virtual on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Virtual on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: VirtualBox Tips 'N' Tricks
item.description: To change the resolution {% highlight bash %} VBoxManage controlvm “MACHINE NAME” setvideomodehint WIDTH HEIGHT BPP {% endhighlight %} Replacing “MACHINE NAME”, WIDTH, HEIGHT and BPP (bits per pixel - 24 or 32) with your values
